column1: 839911,Cement and Concrete Plant Worker,,"Build construction forms or moulds
column7: Pour materials into, or on, designated areas
column13: Spread concrete or other aggregate mixtures
column15: Signal equipment operators to indicate proper equipment positioning
column17: Smooth surfaces with abrasive materials or tools
column19: Measure dimensions of completed products or work pieces to verify conformance to specifications
column23: Compact or smooth materials to create level bases
column25: Sort materials or products for processing, storing, shipping or grading
column29: Inspect finishes of work pieces or finished products
column31: Mix substances or compounds needed for work activities
column33: Package products for storage or shipment
column35: Move products, materials or equipment between work areas
column37: Study blueprints or other instructions to determine equipment setup requirements
column41: Apply sealants or other protective coatings
column47: Watch equipment in operation to detect malfunctions
